basics.name: Andrew Rose
basics.label: Security Engineer, Blue Teamer, Linux Beard

work.summary: As a security engineer, I use and build modern, scale-friendly tools to collect, analyze, and take action on security events across the product and the organization as a whole.
highlights: Create and scale infrastructure to collect event data from across the organization
Monitor incoming data to alert on significant security events
Generate and apply formal incident response procedures
Analyze data to determine future improvements to detection and response capabilities
Affect change in systems and processes to reduce attack surface

work.summary: Finding things that suck, and fixing them
highlights: Improve interactions between systems that don't offer native interoperability

work.summary: Wearer of many hats in financial services IT
highlights: Mac and Windows security enforcement, deployment, and management (Munki, AutoPkg)
Google Apps, ESXi, Active Directory administration
